content: i-love-this-yarn shades dark brown white for the blanket i m pretty sure it is the yarn bee brand it s a very silky yarn and rather lacy its color is a dusky blue i m sorry i can t name it exactly the label was lost months ago if you are absolutely smitten with the cuteness of this little project you may want to check out my bedtime mouse 1 pattern where you can get a little mouse to go with the bed the bedtime mouse pattern can be viewed here 2 in my store in the mouse series bundle it s available for purchase at one dollar this bed is also the perfect size for calico critters the stitches used are bobble single slip_stitch half double chain increase and decrease double back loop only front loop only i would love to see a picture of your little bed please make a project and give feedback enjoy 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bedtime-mouse
